column2: "Nyia no ntɔhwɛbo abɔ
column4: mma ɔnnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu."

column2: "Nyia wɔawo no wɔ edwaman bi nnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu; n'ebusuasantsen a otsia du mpo mu biara nnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu."
"Ammonnyi anaa Moabnyi nnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu; hɔn ebusuasantsen a otsia du mpo mu biara nnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu ara da:"
"osiandɛ wɔammfa edziban na ɔnye nsu emmbehyia hom wɔ ɔkwan no mu
column3: aber a hom fi Egypt reba no; na dɛ wɔkɔbɔɔ Beer ne babanyin Balaam a ofi Petor a ɔwɔ Mesopotemia no paa dɛ ɔmbɔdom wo ntsi."

column2: "Naaso EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ammpɛ dɛ otsie Balaam; na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn daan ndom no nhyira maa wo
column3: osiandɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dɔɔ wo."

column2: "Mma nnhwehwɛ hɔn asomdwee nye hɔn eyiedzi wo nda nyinara daa."
"Mma nnkyir Edomnyi; na ɔyɛ wo nua: mma nnkyir Egyptnyi; osiandɛ ekɛyɛɛ n'asaase do ɔhɔho."
"Ebusuasantsen a otsia ebiasa mba a wɔbɔwo hɔn ama hɔn no na wɔnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu."
"Sɛ ifir edzi kɛkyer w'atamfo ho nsera a
column3: ɔno sie woho yie wɔ adze bɔn biara ho."

column2: "Sɛ ɔbanyin bi wɔ hom mu a no ho nntsew wɔ no ha a ɔsen anadwe bi ntsi a
column3: ɔno omfi nseraban no mu nkɔ ekyir

column2: "na ɔmbra dɛ orudu ewimbir no
column3: onguar noho wɔ nsu mu: na sɛ wi kɔtɔ a

column2: "Nya beebi so wɔ nseraban no ekyir
"na nya ɔsɔsɔw wɔ wo ndadzedze mu; na ɔmbra dɛ
column5: na aasan ekyir akata dza ofi wo mu ba no do:"

column2: "na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nenam wo nseraban mu
column4: na ɔdze w'atamfo ama wɔ w'enyim; dɛm ntsi wo nseraban nyɛ krɔnkrɔn: amma oeennhu efifidze bi wɔ wo mu

column2: "Mma nnyi akowaa a oefi no wura nkyɛn eguan aba wo hɔ mma no wura:"
"ma ɔnye wo ntsena
column4: wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔbɛsan mu eyi no wɔ wo nkuropon no kor mu
column5: mbrɛ ɔpɛ no dodow no: mma nnhyɛ no do."

column2: "Mma Israel mbabaa mu biara nnyɛ edwaman
column3: nkyii so mma Israel mbabanyin mu biara nndan edwaman."

column2: "Mma mmfa ɔbaa edwaman apaabɔdze
column4: mmba EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn fie wɔ anohoba biara mu: na ebien yi nyina yɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Mma mmbɔ wo nua bosa nngye nsiho:"
"ɔnanaben na bɔ no bosa gye nsiho; na wo nua dze
column3: mma mmbɔ no bosa nngye nsiho: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn eehyira wo adze a edze wo nsa bɛka nyinara mu
column4: wɔ asaase a erokɔ akɛfa no do."

column2: "Sɛ ebɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn anohoba a
column3: mma nnyɛ nyaa dɛ ebɔpon: na ampaara EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɔhwehwɛ no wɔ wo hɔ; na ɔbɛdan wo bɔn."

column2: "Na sɛ ema anohoba no ka a
"Dza efi w'anofamfa do epue no dwen do na yɛ; dɛ mbrɛ abɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn anohoba
column3: ayamuyi afɔr a edze w'ano aka no."

column2: "Sɛ idu wo nyɛnko no wenyin ture mu a
column3: ɔno dzi esikyireamba no bi mee; mbom mma mmfa bi nngu w'adze mu."

column2: "Sɛ idu wo nyɛnko n'eburow a osisi hɔ mu a
column3: ɔno fa wo nsa pempan mbɛtsem no bi; mbom mma mma dadze do wɔ wo nyɛnko n'eburow a osisi hɔ do."
